languages.text: "Надеюсь, под вашим руководством династия сумеет благополучно оправиться от этого удара и приумножить свою власть".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, под вашим руководством ваша династия сумеет благополучно оправиться от этого удара и приумножить свою власть".

languages.text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, под вашим руководством династия сумеет благополучно оправиться от этого удара и приумножить свою власть".

traits.locale_text: "I hope that under your guidance, your dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."
"I hope that under your guidance, your dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."
"I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."
"I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."
"I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

languages.text: 「君の導きの下、王朝が今回の不幸から立ち直り、さらに大きな権力を得ることを願っている」
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: 「君の導きの下、王朝が今回の不幸から立ち直り、さらに大きな権力を得ることを願っている」

languages.text: “我希望在您的指引下，王朝能从这次打击中恢复过来，变得更加强盛。”
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: “我希望在您的指引下，王朝能从这次打击中恢复过来，变得更加强盛。”

languages.text: «Espero que, con su guía, la dinastía pueda recuperarse de este golpe y granjearse un poder aún más inconmensurable».
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que, con su guía, la dinastía pueda recuperarse de este golpe y granjearse un poder aún más inconmensurable».

languages.text: « J'espère que sous votre contrôle, la dynastie saura rebondir après ce coup du sort et renforcer encore son pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que sous votre contrôle, la dynastie saura rebondir après ce coup du sort et renforcer encore son pouvoir. »

languages.text: "Hoffentlich kann die Dynastie sich unter Eurer Führung von diesem Schlag erholen und noch mächtiger werden."
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: "Hoffentlich kann die Dynastie sich unter Eurer Führung von diesem Schlag erholen und noch mächtiger werden."

languages.text: "Umarım hanedanlık, önderliğinizde bu darbeden kısa sürede toparlanıp daha da büyük güç elde eder."
languages.original_text: "I hope that under your guidance, the dynasty can recover from this blow and attain even greater power."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım hanedan, önderliğinizde bu darbeyi kaldırıp daha da büyük güç elde edebilir."
